title: Font ID Please?
content:
Please don’t look at the logo!

What is this typeface?

Thanks!

Adam

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110056im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logosm_4558.gif)
author: lazyeye88

comments.content:
... or [Old Towne](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110056/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/old-towne-no-536/)

[Please use a descriptive title next time! Thank you.](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110056/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2)

Thanks!

What would suffice as an acceptable title for this post? I don’t know how I can be more descriptive when I don’t know which font I’m looking at!

Adam
Yes, that would be a good one that helps finding it when the next one is looking for it. Alternatively (or even better, additionally), something like ‘Wild West style’ or ‘with heavy square serifs’.
